narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Sunterra Health, Inc. is a Home Delivered Meals provider based in Costa Mesa, CA. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $71.4M in Medicaid payments across 1.4M claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $71.4M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
